content: in a court case that lasted for 16 years one party was awarded compensation the court ordered the other party to pay a sum of eur 4467112 to the winning party along with interest the case involved the open succession of a deceased person and the dissolution of their community property the surviving spouse and four children were involved in the case the court declared the succession dissolved the community property and ordered the sale of a share of a flat the court also considered renovations and previous donations in determining the value of the estate and dividing it among the heirs the court addressed the division of real estate and payment of debts the case concluded with the awarding of costs to the parties involved the court made a final decision on a claim filed by one party against several others the court declared the succession of the deceased person and awarded half of a flat workshop to the claimant the claimant was also ordered to pay the defendants a sum of eur 4467112 plus interest finally all parties involved in the proceedings will be fully compensated for their costs

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Torre Annunziata sez. I, 22/03/2017, n.850
